fullplot: Lorenzo is set to a tango and is a story about a self centered and vain cat that taunts the other cats with his food and his beautiful tail. A mysterious street cat sees his behavior and puts a hex on the vain cat's tail making it come alive. The tail goes on to torture and tease the vain cat in a tango till the vain cat is finally forced to get rid of his tail.
plot: A cat, Lorenzo, is dismayed to discover that his tail has developed a personality of its own.
title: Lorenzo

tomatoes.consensus: Judi Dench and Bob Hoskins shine in this warm, witty period piece.
